definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: The Pomerol wine can be more robust than others in Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 龐馬魯葡萄酒比其他波爾多酒更爲濃烈。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing about Clos Fourtet was the vast underground wine cellars, among the finest in Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 富達莊園擁有波爾多區最大的地下酒窖。

sentences.english: The Uruguay international is set to sign for the French club on-loan to the end of this season.
sentences.chinese: 烏拉圭國腳下半賽季將可能被租借到法甲的波爾多隊。

sentences.english: I think the Bordeaux should be decanted now and allowed to breathe for a little while.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現在波爾多酒應該輕輕倒，好讓氣味散發一下。

sentences.english: Bordeaux want to bring Roma striker Shabani Nonda back to France.
sentences.chinese: 波爾多想把農達帶回法國。

sentences.english: The Morocco striker Marouane Chamakh, though, looks set to finally arrive on a free transfer from Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 而摩洛哥前鋒查馬克也即將從波爾多自由轉會而來。

sentences.english: A city of western France on the Charente River north-northeast of Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 法國西部一城市，靠近查蘭特河，在波爾多東北偏北。

sentences.english: Saint-Emilion is the oldest wine area of the Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 聖愛美濃是波爾多地區最古老的酒區。

sentences.english: The top-ranked Bordeaux was Latour, which came in fifth.
sentences.chinese: 排名最靠前的波爾多是拉圖爾，排在第五位。

sentences.english: Bordeaux, a seaport and most famous for its wine.
sentences.chinese: 波爾多是海港城市，它盛產的葡萄酒名揚天下。

sentences.english: I started really well at Bordeaux but then I picked up a knee injury.
sentences.chinese: 我剛去波爾多的時候還很好，但後來受了膝傷。

sentences.english: The southwestern city of Bordeaux wine has a long history, its wines worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 西南部城市波爾多釀酒歷史悠久，其葡萄酒馳名於世。

sentences.english: Maison Bouey is one of the last few independent family companies in Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 寶邑世家是波爾多僅存的幾家獨立傳統家族酒商之一。

sentences.english: Americans boycotted brie cheese and Bordeaux wine.
sentences.chinese: 美國人也抵制法國奶酪和波爾多葡萄酒。

sentences.english: This occurs particularly in the commune villages of the Haut-Médoc, to the north of Bordeaux and in the northern Graves.
sentences.chinese: 主要在梅鐸克的村莊，波爾多的北部及格拉夫的北部。

sentences.english: Perhaps, he reasoned, life in Bordeaux would not be so bad.
sentences.chinese: 也許，他想，波爾多的生活不會那麼糟糕。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
Jura mountains of eastern France and extending into Switzerland
variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
